title: UI/UX Designer
description: Kami mencari UI/UX Designer untuk bergabung dengan tim Solve Education (via Glassdoor). Tanggung jawab utama meliputi: Assist Program Designers in creating wireframes, user flows, and prototypes; Collaborate with developers to implement user-centric features; Design and execute user research activities (surveys, interviews, usability tests); Document key research findings and translate into actionable recommendations. Posisi ini adalah program magang yang memberikan kesempatan belajar dan pengembangan karir.

hard_skills: Proficiency in Figma or similar tools
Certification in Bangkit Academy or UI/UX related
